greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Write 2 - Zeta(s) in the form Product_{n > 1}(1 - a(n)/n^s).
formula: a(n) = Sum_t (-1)^(v(t)-1) where the sum is over all strict tree-factorizations of n (see A295279 for definition) and v(t) is the number of nodes (branchings and leaves) in t.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 24 2017
